page.title: 14Lutton Village.
page.content: Lutton is about a mile from Cornwood. In Lutton there is quite a variety of houses. There are farm houses, old and new houses. There is a garage and also a pub. The bus route comes from Cornwood through Lutton to Plymouth. There are two bus stops. There is nowhere for the children in Lutton to play so we play in the road. There are two activities - cubs for boys only and Sunday School. There is no school so children go to Cornwood or Sparkwell schools. There is no shop in Lutton but there used to be one which also used to be the Post Office and a hairdressers. The building is now used as a private house. There is one telephone box in Yondertown square. There are a few street lights dotted around the village. Emma Milligan.
